title: It doesn't work properly
comment: Images for anime are grayed out, links to anime providers experience errors and it overall fails to work properly on the Nexus 7
Update 2015-05-09: The anime shouldn't be grayed out anymore (unless you don't have any new episodes). Can you tell me some details why it fails on your Nexus 7? No crashes have been logged.
Awesome, keep up the good work.

title: Amazing
comment: It's working great. But when can we expect getting notification about a released episode in the notification bar?

Glad that it's working now.
Notifications are automatically checked in the background, the default is to check every hour for new episodes.
You can set the update interval in the settings to something lower, however keep in mind that if you do that it will slightly increase the battery usage (logically).
It only notifies when the app is not opened.

title: Working great!
comment: Thanks for this app! Now I can keep track of new anime episodes without visiting AniList. :)

You just made my day.
Cheers, I'll work on improving it a lot in the future so I can get it out of Beta.
